title: Least prosperous group in the 1920s - camparison

content.prompt: The LEAST prosperous group in the 1920s consisted of

choices.label: workers in older industries like steel and railroads
workers in newer industries like radio and automobiles
farmers in the Midwest and the South
skilled workers threatened by new laborsaving technologies

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
